Key Match Events: Ben Stokes hit six fours and an equal number of sixes during his knock.
Chris Woakes got Max O'Dowd to chip one to mid-on.
An absolute jaffa from David Willey got the edge of Colin Ackermann.
Ben Stokes hit six fours and six sixes on the way to his century.
Moeen Ali and Chris Woakes stitched together a mammoth 129-run stand for the seventh wicket amassed in just 81 balls.
Pre-Game Insights: Dawid Malan took off in style, hitting a hat-trick of boundaries.
Logan van Beek got the better of Joe Root when the batter tried to reverse-scoop him.
Jos Buttler was run out due to van Beek's accurate throw in the inner ring.
Post-Match Reflections: Ben Stokes brought up his maiden Cricket World Cup ton in the 48th over.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dawid Malan's attacking 87 guided England in the early stages.
Aryan Dutt bowled Joe Root after he tried to reverse-scoop him.
Teja Nidamanuru hit a four and three sixes soon after coming to the crease and added 59 from 50 balls for the sixth wicket.
